author: Simon Difford
description: Originally with a dash of sugar syrup but, thanks to a comment by Yacha Han on Difford's Guide,  presented here with maple syrup as a more appropriate sweetener. Whether you use sugar or maple syrup, both tame and amplify the flavour of the whiskey, but maple syrup contributes so much more. However, it's Fernet that dominates this Manhattan-style cocktail.
name: Toronto Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
